title: AI-based career development platform launched for students & professionals
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 01 (APP): In a significant step toward empowering students and professionals with cutting-edge career support, the official launch of AimNexus.ai, an AI-driven Career Development Platform, was held at Preston University Islamabad here the other day.
The platform is developed by Muhammad Ismail, Founder & CEO of AimNovo, and a proud alumnus of the Department of Electronics at Quaid-i-Azam University Islamabad.
During the launch event, Muhammad Ismail introduced the web application and shared its salient features.
He emphasized how AimNexus.ai serves as a smart, all-in-one solution for students and early-career professionals to prepare for the job market and take charge of their career development.
Speaking on the occasion, Dr. Abdul Basit, President of Preston University and the Federal Chapter of the Association of Private Sector Universities of Pakistan (APSUP), and Muhammad Murtaza Noor, National Coordinator of the Inter-University Consortium for the Promotion of Social Sciences and founder of the International Students Convention, lauded the initiative.
Both leaders highlighted the platform’s potential to democratize access to career resources and pledged to support awareness sessions across Pakistan to ensure maximum students benefit from this free-of-cost service.
According to the details, AimNexus.ai is designed to be a personalized career guide that uses artificial intelligence to support users at every step of their professional journey.
The platform’s Smart Resume Builder Pro allows users to easily create and enhance their resumes by using AI to suggest improvements and optimize language for maximum impact in job and internship applications.
Users can build interview confidence through unlimited practice sessions with the AI Interview Coach, which offers feedback on responses and even analyzes body language to help users prepare thoroughly for real interviews.
Finding suitable opportunities becomes quicker and more accurate with the Personalized Opportunity Finder, which matches users with internships and entry-level jobs based on their skills and interests, complete with a match score to guide decision-making.
For those uncertain about their career direction, the Skill Booster tool helps identify strengths and recommends skills to develop, while also pointing to relevant learning resources to support continuous growth.
To help users stay informed about the evolving job market, the platform also offers a personalized news feed featuring updates and trends related to their field of interest, ensuring they are equipped to make smart, future-focused career choices.
The platform is now live and accessible to students and professionals nationwide.
The event concluded with a strong commitment from the stakeholders to facilitate outreach efforts, ensuring that AimNexus.ai becomes a career catalyst for thousands across Pakistan.
